tips.title: Reduce Carbon Footprint
tips.description: Carpool, use public transport, or switch to bicycles to reduce carbon emissions.

tips.title: Save Water
tips.description: Turn off taps when not in use and fix leaks to conserve water.

tips.title: Use Renewable Energy
tips.description: Switch to solar panels or green energy plans to power your home sustainably.

tips.title: Plant Trees
tips.description: Planting trees helps absorb carbon dioxide and improve air quality.

tips.title: Say No to Plastic
tips.description: Use reusable bags, bottles, and containers instead of single-use plastics.

tips.title: Recycle Properly
tips.description: Sort your waste and ensure recyclables are cleaned and properly disposed of.

tips.title: Switch Off Lights
tips.description: Turn off lights and electronics when not in use to save energy.

tips.title: Eat Sustainably
tips.description: Choose locally sourced and seasonal food to lower environmental impact.
